org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block.property

Class BlockPropertyManagerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block.property.BlockPropertyManagerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBlockPropertyManager

    public class BlockPropertyManagerComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBlockPropertyManager
    Implementation of IBlockPropertyManager. Because of limitations, simply delegating to this using the Delegate annotation will not work, you will also need to override the following method. If IUnlistedProperty are detected, an ExtendedBlockState will be automatically created instead of a normal IBlockState. @Override protected BlockState createBlockState() { return (propertyManager = new BlockPropertyManagerComponent(this)).createDelegatedBlockState(); }
